short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your experience on 9gag.com by blocking ADs, fixing Grammarly layer, fixing scroll and showing down-votes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your experience on 9gag.com by blocking ADs, fixing Grammarly layer, fixing Scroll.

Options:
- Remove annoying ADs banners on the right and between posts
- Make red lines and icon of Grammarly entension visible in comment field
- Remove horizontal scroll
- Show down votes in stream
